intro: Just a random wanderer lost in time and looking for a reason.

post.body: We are truly living in shit times. The whole covid crap is annoying and honestly, if you really look at it, it's all very suspect. They keep taking our rights and justify it with some "virus". Even if the virus is real, the death toll is lower than the flu! Yet everyone is going crazy! And the flu somehow no longer exists? Everything is a "covid death" nowadays. It's all very strange.
